website_summaries.verdict: Like most color-changing lights, these strips are a fun, expensive smart-home novelty.
pros: The Lifx Z light strips don't need a bridge or a hub plugged into your router, and they let you "paint" multiple colors onto the strips -- two distinct advantages over Philips Hue
They also work with IFTTT, Nest, SmartThings and Amazon's Alexa
cons: Controls for that color-painting feature are pretty imprecise, and you can't save any of your custom patterns to use later
There's also no way to animate your light patterns -- and no Apple HomeKit compatibility, either

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome!! I have the LifX Z strip behind my tv (13ft) and also behind recessed crown molding. I also have two LifX BR30 floodlights over my bar area. I can literally turn my man cave into a night club. The app connects everything flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: A great idea, terrible execution
customer_reviews.text: Whilst these light strips have a thousand different options to connect with, come from a good company and connect to all Alexa, homekit etc, sadly they lack the most important ingredient - the ability to stick to a surface. After following instructions on where and how I should stick these light strips, within 2 days they begin to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Playbooth

customer_reviews.title: Finally, these work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd try I've given these lights. Any other brand I would've given up on, but LIFX has the best colors, hands down. The two previous tries with the Z were endlessly frustrating and I had to return them because I could not get them to connect. I decided to try this new version that supports homekit/assistant, on the off chance they ship with an updated firmware that wouldn't cause me the same headaches. Sure enough, they connected flawlessly, and even went through the firmware upgrade without a hiccup. FINALLY! It looks like we're on the right track now. Worth the wait for these colors. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: FOR ANYONE HAVING ISSUES WITH ONLY THE FIRST HALF OF THE STRIP LIGHTING UP: -There is a small reset button on the rectangle block next to the power adapter, press and hold it till it hard resets. Was driving me crazy forever! They need to fix this issue or clearly tell people how to solve it. Other than that, these things are amazing. I'm in love with all kinds of LED stuff and these take the cake for light strips. Philips hue suck in comparison IMO. I still love hue for other stuff tho Definitely worth your money
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rustlips

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: To all the people giving this bad reviews because they can't figure out how to clean a surface should be ignored. I used a paper towel and rubbing alcohol, cleaned the back of my TV, waited an entire 30 seconds for it to dry and then placed it on the back. The only difficulty I had was with my T-Rex arms and taking the 3-M paper off the adhesive. the strips went on just fine and since I already have some Lifx bulbs I already had the app installed, pairing was simple and presto I have a lighted TV for gaming. Easy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD power adapter. Can only use this in loud areas.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are beautiful and have great features, but I had to take them out of my bedroom as the power adapter buzzes VERY loudly. It's almost like a low buzzing steady headache. I had this one for about an hour in my office and upon turning it off found a huge sense of relief. The lights are unsable in most places in my home. This does work okay in my living room, though, since movies are louder than the buzzing, but these cannot be used for low sound areas (which is most of my home).
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Liking this more than the Phillips HUE
customer_reviews.text: I am beginning to like LiFX products better than Phillips HUE. You do not need a bridge to operate these lights! You can control them from anywhere. My disclaimer is I do NOT know if HUE can do the same thing without setting up another account and another password ad nausuem. Biggest selling point is........ IF YOU LOSE POWER THE LIGHTS WILL STAY OFF UNLIKE HUE WHICH WILL TURN ON AND WAKE UP THE HOUSE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these strips attached to the back of my tv. They are easy to install, setup and operate. I had to use spots of glue to keep them in place which was expected. Tacky adhesives soften when warmed up. Very pleased with the end result and addition to the rest of my Lifx lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to set them up but right from the start i had issues. 1. Upon initial setup it asked me to update the lights. Hung for 15 minutes and had to force quit app. 2. I got connected finally and tried changing colors and dimming/brightening. Nothing happens. 3. I power cycled and tried again. Actions are severely delayed, i get constant light offline msgs etc. All this for $90
customer_reviews.author: MrSinister

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: These were fine for the first few months, but after being unplugged for a bit they went into "Factory Test Mode" (flashing Red, Green, Blue, White & then Purple). Multiple attempts at resetting, removing from the Cloud/app, and stopping the test mode failed. I created a support ticket with Lifx and they promptly shipped me a warranty replacement. The replacement had the same problem, right out of the box. I escalated to Lifx again, was told another replacement would be sent. That has not been received and they have stopped responding to my emails. I replaced this with the Govee Dreamcolor Led Strip Lights, which is cheaper, less temperamental, and has brighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: TFP

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for bias / recessed lighting
customer_reviews.text: Woah, so so sooo much better than the cheap kit I tried before this. I thought - 90$ for LED’s? Am I a moron? Turns out you really do get what you pay for. I use mine for bias lighting that is set up to gradually turn warmer in color as the day goes on, huge eye strain reduction for someone who unfortunately looks at a stupid screen all day. Highly recommend if you really want a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: ben brown

customer_reviews.title: Stops animating when cell phone disconnects
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, nice bright colors. However there's one design flaw-the animations are run on your connected cellphone. If your cellphone disconnects for any reason then they stop and then it can be difficult to regain connectivity. It would have been far better if the cellphone controlled the animations but they then ran autonomously on the LIFX. Hoping they come up with a firmware fix otherwise I will not buy any more. I have a tablet on the wall I use for home automation so I run LIFX from that. It's a bit inconvenient but it works. Otherwise I would have rated it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great mood lighting under desk. Teen approved!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights for under my daughters desk along with a couple bulbs. Her room is definitely teen hang-out worthy now! We had a difficult time at first with getting the extension to light up. Hint: Don't plug the first one in without the extension or you have to reset it. It works great with her phone app and love the rainbow effect it can give compared to just the light bulbs. Great mood lighting. Only drawback is the adhesion, but certainly not a big deal. It sticks most of the way and most of the problem area is on the angles where it's hard anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty_B

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: It was probably the luck of the draw and I'm sure we could have easily returned them for an exchange, but one strand of lights came with a section that only turns two colors. We got these lights for fun so it didn't bother us that much. It's great how we can change the colors with an app on our phones and we enjoy changing the colors to match whatever holiday it is. We would purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to create a nice ambiance for when my family and I watch TV. This did exactly that. Cons: Adhesive part isn’t as good as I thought but I improvised and now it works fine Pros: Tons of colors to choose from Price You can creat your own scenes to use Easy install Easy integration with Alexa (even with Xfinity) I’ve had these for about 7 months now and not a single complaint
customer_reviews.author: Drknght

customer_reviews.title: LifX LEDs can't be beat but the controller is too easily overheated and drops wifi
customer_reviews.text: The LEDs of the Z strip are unmatched in this category and the scenes and themes are beautiful. But Lifx needs to work on the shielding of the controller. it's meant to be tucked away and out of sight, so why is it so prone to over heating? When it does it drops wifi and lord help trying to reconnect it anytime soon. If Lifx can fix that itd be a 5 start but otherwise it's 4 for me
customer_reviews.author: V. Langer

customer_reviews.title: It is not NEW!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the NEW product but when item received it is clearly USED, with existing packaging sticker opened and when I open inside can clearly see the power adapter is used with DIRT, dust, and lot of hair around the WHOLE LED light strip, back of the 3M glue was used and pasted it back as you can see the glue stick with tons of dust and hair. Very very disappointing. Gonna find time to ship it back too! Please send NEW item when you claim it is a NEW/Unused product.
customer_reviews.author: JWorld

customer_reviews.title: Works reliably, audible buzzing noise
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these in our apartment, two above sets of cabinets, now one for behind each TV. I love the amount of light they produce and how responsive they are, plus I haven't had to hard reset them like some of the bulbs when they stop responding. Anyway, I have no complaints other than the power supplies for all four of them make an audible buzzing noise when the strips are on. I'd expect these to be nearly silent since they're so expensive. I wouldn't recommend paying full price for these strips, get them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: MacGruber

customer_reviews.title: Rarely works with Google home assistant
customer_reviews.text: Integration with Google home is terrible. The lights almost never work. I created names for all my lights. For example, I named all my z strip lights as "accent lights." When I say, "turn accent light on," Google home just wants to search for accent lights on the web. It rarely turns on like it's suppose to. It's a pretty annoying problem that I have been troubleshooting for the last couple of weeks with no solution. Bottom line, just avoid the light strips all together and stick with the bulbs. The bulbs seem to work with Google Home Assistant.
customer_reviews.author: RLKL

customer_reviews.title: Faulty equipment for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received a faulty product. When I plug the LIFX z both strips flash random colors and won’t do what I programmed them to do. I tried each strip in different order then by themselves & it won’t work. I tried contacting the LIFX company but outside the initial we received your claim I haven’t received word and it has been over a week. If somehow they contact me and replace the strips I’d give the lights a better review because they look good from the colors I see however for the price it’s not worth playing the lottery to see if it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing led light strips.
customer_reviews.text: I have many LIFX products. They all including the LIFX strip are easy step by step instructions to use with your WiFi. The app is easy to use and gives you many options. I used these in my kitchen on top of my cabinets to give it a expensive look and feel to my kitchen. What a enhancement. Everyone that sees them ask how much and are stunned at how cheap and easy they are to install.
customer_reviews.author: Will I am

customer_reviews.title: Much worse than Philips Hue
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of smart lights in my home. I decided to try LIFX to see if they were any better than the rest on the market. The lack of a hub was appealing as it would make them good gifts for my parents, who are less tech savvy. Well, they worked fine for a month. Now I am having endless connectivity problems. I need to unplug them and plug them back in daily to get them to reconnect. On the other hand, I’ve had Hue lights for 2 years and never had a single issue. I am definitely sticking with Hue 100% from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light strips, to expensive and to short
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this light strip and I really did. Unfortunately I am returning them. They are too expensive for the length that you get. 5stars if they were longer. I was hoping to install them behind my 65in TV but I would end up needing 2.5 of these to go all the way around. They are so so bright and the colors are truly on point. The light strip I ended up buying instead is no where near as bright and the colors are mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the most part!
customer_reviews.text: The lights & settings are so bright & easy to work with! The app to remotely control it makes it so fun to do! I truly enjoy these lights & I have them on every night! Lots of colors & themes that you can work with including music! I have one complaint though, this package comes with two strips and no matter which one I plugged into the power supply, one of the strips just would not work. I’ve also tried other outlets and that one strip will not light up. It’s sad because I would have liked the full length of lights to work rather than half. Besides that problem, everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: faith pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Impressive lights and so many options!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights and they are perfect for my apartment. The app is easy to use and I didn’t have problems installing it and connecting it to my WiFi. I love all the options to choose from whether it’s for a a kickback or to just help me wake up in the morning. The only downside is that the adhesion doesn’t last that long so I had to use something else to keep them up. I’ve had problems with connecting 3 strips together because the last one always fails to work after some time but the customer service is amazing and I was able to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Jazlin Perez

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS USED
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me this and I knew it was used but refurbished when I bought it. It was unusable since there was no sticky left on the back of one of the links and thew other had the tape but it was also not sticky. It wouldn't connect to wifi and one link stayed on no matter what. It's been well over the 7 day refund after they received it back. Buy it new or don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning consumer

customer_reviews.title: So far soo bad!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so bad! One of the two strips is defective. Worked for the first 5 mins.. long enough to think it was working and actually install it. So when it starts just flashing through a bunch of colors without stopping.. after spending about an hour troubleshooting and am giving up and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Turned my white headboard into a light show.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool. My white headboard has a really great design carved in it which was slightly washed out against my white bedroom wall. I installed the strip along the top of the headboard in the back, and just look at the result. I don’t even need a lamp in my bedroom because this can be as bright or as dim as I need it to be. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DavidStark

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but a bit annoying to control.
customer_reviews.text: The colors the lights produce are great! With full RGB the sky's the limit. But actually getting the colors on the lights is a little bit of a hassle. You can see from the picture, that my strip is displaying 2 colors along 3 sections. The real-time editing of those colors makes it easy to find the location of where i'm paining on the app but it isn't precise enough to fine tune the color sections. Also saving the profile is a bit hidden and i didn't know how to do it until recently. To sum it up, the lights work great, but actually controlling them is annoying. 8/10
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Crappy software. Beautiful lighting
customer_reviews.text: The app is frustrating and not intuitive. It's easy to "fill" paint over work you spent time putting into a lighting design... Worst part is there is no undo button. Really obnoxious. A simple "undo" function when pertaining a scene, would save a lot of customers a whole lot of frustration. Looks gorgeous though after pulling out a few hairs with the poor UI design.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customizable Light Strip
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble getting the initial setup going between the lights and the app, but after trying a second time I got it to work. These lights are much brighter than the Hue strip lights. I didn't use the adhesion strip, I used zip ties as an attachment method for my application. I love the customizable options with these lights. They are a little pricey, but high quality. The app is sometimes a little glitchy. But overall a great product. I fabricated my own sign and added these as backlighting.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A.

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from wifi
customer_reviews.text: This is great when it works, but the WiFi connection is unreliable. I also have a LIFX mini and regular bulb And a NanoLeaf Canvas. I have 2 UniFi WiFi access points. One is 12 feet from this device. So WIFI IS NOT THE PROBLEM.... and the other lifx bulbs are good too.... but many have said , the problem is that the WiFi system on this thing randomly disconnects. For me it is daily
customer_reviews.author: phillip young

customer_reviews.title: Brightest lights out there
customer_reviews.text: These are simply the brightest lights out there. I purchased a couple different brands and these are the best. I ultimately decided I did not want them, but if I had installed lights I would have chosen these. They have the best WiFi integration with Alexa and smart home stuff. Additionally, the colors are really bright and cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Have two sets that are a year old that work ok. They are a little buggy, not quite matching colors or sometimes not coming on. Bought another set and it was stuck in factory reset mode. Returned them for the same thing and the replacement was also stuck in factory reset. With the buggy app and inconsistent function, and now two bad sets in a row I'm done. Two stars. Too bad, they are really bright and pretty lights! They just suffer from quality control issues
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Horrible After-Purchase Support
customer_reviews.text: I received a LIFX Z Strip product that was 50% defective - one of the strips is nonfunctional. I contacted LIFX support and received a ticket (434200) and a promise that a replacement part would be sent in 2-3 days. Two weeks later and nothing... This is not the support I expect from an Amazon partner.
customer_reviews.author: Too Many Ceedees

customer_reviews.title: An absolute MUST for every smart home!
customer_reviews.text: These strips output amazingly bright lights! They are very responsive with my Apple Homekit setup and Philips Hue Motion Detector. I get lots of compliments from people who visit me and see how professional looking these strips are. I highly recommend getting these! Only CONs are that you need to purchase another starter kit if you want to place another set in a different room and if you cut the strips, you cannot reconnect them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing LED strips
customer_reviews.text: These LED strips are amazing. The ability to display multiple colors throughout the strip looks incredible. The cons, the cost. Literally the only con, they are so expensive and so small. I had no trouble connecting them nor adding them to Alexa. They're easy to use, bright and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Joram Tapiero

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for ambient lighting in my bedroom and also for background while streaming, this product is absolutely amazing!! Bright, very well made, extremely easy to install, and comes with 3/ adhesive tape attached to the back of the lighting strip. I chose to razor the protective paper on the adhesive tape in small sections so I didn't have to use the whole strip, therefore leaving plenty of adhesive tape if I want to move the light strip in the future. Will definitely be purchasing more products from LIFX in the future!! Awesome product!!! ***These pics are only a 3ft strip and I purchased a total of 9ft, still figuring out what to do with the remaining 6ft!
customer_reviews.author: Cary B Legarth

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and fragile
customer_reviews.text: While these are great when they work, minimal damage to the strip will cause it to go into 'factory reset mode' where it blinks all sorts of colors and is basically unusable. Side note: do not buy from Amazon warehouse... The rate of DOA in factory reset mode, plus missing of little parts like the plastic connector from the plug to the outlet, render the little savings useless when your time is taken into account
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one as a gift because I’ve had my LIFX light strips for over a year now and enjoy them everyday. Amazing mood lighting for dark nights and dull days. You can make your own colour schemes very easily. Works over wifi, doesn’t use much electricity, and it is very easy to install and set up. If the adhesive stops working from moving locations, simply secure it with clear tape. I love these lights so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Max Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased THREE sets of these lights (November and December 2019). By May they are all dead. I have attempted to contact the company for weeks and nobody has helped me. They do not have chat or a number to call. I highly recommend you do not let your kids talk you into this waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana

customer_reviews.title: super bright but do not work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights and they would not stick to anything. When I FINALLY got them to stick, they won't stay connected. Sometimes the app can find the lights, sometimes they won't. Sometimes Google home finds the lights and turns them on but then can't find the lights to turn them off. Amazing brightness, terrible follow through. I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy From LIFX
customer_reviews.text: LIFX is a horrible company to deal with. Just check their F BBB rating. The lights were great for a couple months. Then they started blinking after reseting the lights multiple times, we submitted a warranty claim. It’s been more than a month and I have yet to hear from LIFX.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gartner

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. MASSIVE HEADACHE.
customer_reviews.text: This is the SECOND LIFX Z light strip I have purchased that is faulty. It is stuck in factory reset mode where it cycles through all colors and does not respond to the app controller other than being turned off and on. Customer support is nonexistent. They do not have a number to call and have not responded to emails for months. DO NOT BUY. Not worth the terrible quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt N.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped connecting to wi-fi about a month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I submitted a help ticket and haven't had a response in a few weeks. The unit no longer connects to wi-fi, so I can't change the color or the brightness. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: DEADPEDAL

customer_reviews.title: Best LED strip light
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and bright light. works flawlessly, I use them for under bed lighting and connected to Samsung smartthings hub. lovely
customer_reviews.author: Almannaee

customer_reviews.title: A factory problem maybe?
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this lights a couple months ago and I never used them because I was waiting to get a new bed frame and now that i tried to use them only two lights strips works, I have a pair of 5 lights strips in total, it’s the same with all the lights, if you try all the other lights they will work but the third one wont
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Has never worked once properly since I got it
customer_reviews.text: It’s super complicated to set up and it won’t work unless if it’s connected to the internet at all times. It will just randomly stop working at times and won’t continue to work until the software is updated usually, or until after you reset it. I’ve had nothing but problems with my unit. I gave LIFX a chance, but I won’t be using anything else from them after the disappointment that this lightstrip has been. Might as well stick with Phillips hue. Hue is better.
customer_reviews.author: mfish72

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lights
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lights. However, since I live on a college campus most of the time, I was a little sad that I could not set the lights up on the campus wifi. While this was the only problem I encountered, I was able to easily set the lights up at my house and I was truly amazed by the quality, brightness, and overall functionality of the lights. I would 100% recommend these lights to friends, family, and even strangers. These LED's are definitely worth the price and I will be looking into buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Best "nonsense purchase" I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite unnecessary purchase of all time. I use these things all of the time and I love them. Easy to install and setup with Google Home. Only downside is that the sticky-ness of the tape isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glasser

customer_reviews.title: Very weak Wi-Fi reception.
customer_reviews.text: This light strip claims to support Apple HomeKit yet I’ve never been able to get it to pair. The Wi-Fi signal coming from this controller is not capable of reaching my Fios Quantum router located about 25 feet away. I have other LIFX lights that are located further away and can connect without issues. This this product needs some improvement before I’ll purchase any more strips.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mark A. Luffred

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but...
customer_reviews.text: Shoppers with the WiFi router across the house beware. Unfortunately I’m using this great product in a room with a weaker WiFi signal. I still get good connection with my phone or pc so that leads me to believe that the WiFi capabilities of the device is lacking. I never change the color and I can’t use automation because I have to unplug and replug the device ten times and get lucky just to fiddle with settings or colors on the app. Again, this is an amazing product but I wish they’d make it possible to use throughout an average sized house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty software and equipment, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: To keep things short, this was not worth the money. It was so expensive, it took 30 minutes to register for the glitchy app, and both of the starter kits barely worked. I'm not sure if amazon sent me used/faulty sets on purpose but I'm hoping for a full refund. Not worth the money, you're better off with basic smart lights for 1/4th the price. I was fascinated by how customizable the light settings were and the music sync, but again due to the faulty design of the app, these features weren't what I thought they'd be. Never falling for a sponsored youtube ad again.
customer_reviews.author: Alda Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Light strips are fragile
customer_reviews.text: The connector on my original home kit was either defective or broke with minimal handling during my install.
customer_reviews.author: Loh Phat

customer_reviews.title: No respond from the support team
customer_reviews.text: After submitting a ticket on the website, no one responded other than a robot giving you instruction to reset the controller which I already mentioned in the report that I did it. So far really bad experience. The light strip was connected at first then showed no connection in the app. I try to reset the controller but it is not responded after pressing it for 10-15 sec as instructed. I also change the other one extend strip included in the box but none of them work. It’s not the wifi issue cause the other two LIFX bulbs I have is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shiun Chang

customer_reviews.title: Missing Wall Adapter
customer_reviews.text: As someone who owns about $700 of Phillips Hue merchandise, I was excited to try this LifeX Z Lightstrip (due to its ability to color-change segments of the same strip). Sadly, the product was inexplicably sent out to me missing the standard 110v wall adapter. I contacted LifeX Support and will update this review with their response. UPDATE: I reached out to customer service, and their help extended as far as, "did you look in the box"? ... Still have an incomplete and non-functional device. I cannot speak to the quality of the merchandise, but the service is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: Using these in the stream room and absolutely love them. They can be incredibly dim to blindingly bright. They have a incredible range of brightness and colors. I love the way you can paint the colors on the bar and apply different effects. It takes a few minutes to understand how to create all the effects, but it's pretty straight forward. I do with they were a little longer for the price, but you definitely get what you pay for. Especially with the nice M3 tape that comes on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Price and value can not be beat!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly some of the best light strips I have. I got some for Govee and for the money they can’t be beat but if I was going for quality and price I would get these LIFX strips again and again. Easy to navigate, great effects, and amazing colors. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Junior Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Lifx has come a long way
customer_reviews.text: I've had some of the first Lifx products and this one always does what you want. I ended up buying 2 more and will probably add to that. Not a single issue over the past month. (the first Lifx bulb was a nightmare with connectivity issues)
customer_reviews.author: ryan gadz

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get these lights to work  we cannot get them working and I spent a lot of money on these
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get these lights to work I’ve written the company three times they have not gotten back to me they do not work with the hub they do not work alone we cannot get them working and I spent a lot of money on these
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have these and the Phillips hue, both are great, the lifx seem to be brighter but the hue is a little easier to control with the hub.
customer_reviews.author: anthony f.

customer_reviews.title: App is horrendous
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the worst app I've ever used. Tech support is non-existent. I am returning this and getting the Hue like I knew I should have. Absolutely garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Loses network connection
customer_reviews.text: Constantly loses network connection. Have to unplug it and plug it back in to regain control. At least add an on/off button!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Seems like these are made with really low quality assurance. At first, only the second strip was faulty - flashing colors, the same as many other reports. I decided to test it by itself. It flashed unless i held the controller cable in a very specific way. The same was not true of the first strip - it was just fine. Until 10 minutes later when it started to do the same thing. I recommend buying something else. These are worth $30 at most.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Only if you’re rich.
customer_reviews.text: I love the brightness and the variety of color. But the app’s features don’t always work correctly. Also. The adhesive was wore off after a few days. I didn’t touch it. It just fell off.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Garbage lights
customer_reviews.text: Horrible lights. Couldn’t connect to the app. Colors were ok. 1/2 the light would work. For the amount of money they were the worst lights I ever bought. Bought ws2812b instead. Only Bluetooth but over 100 different lighting settings
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Broken
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all. I spent several hours on the hanging installation, reading their guides, and realizing I just lost $100. I highly recommend you do not access this product, it is broken. I am using Android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright LEDs worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is a little lacking in stickiness. Using stronger more durable 3m double sided tape got the job done. These LEDs are extremely bright and the quadrants are nice and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Meed Djoser

customer_reviews.title: Highly Pricey for its size.
customer_reviews.text: First things first the Brand’s Product is really great! Was planning on covering the top of the walls on my room. Problem is that this is short and expensive. The title and description of the Product didn’t clearly specify the length (which is 5-6ft long) at the time I bought it which threw me off when I found how small the packaging was and it’s size.
customer_reviews.author: Shooup

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: pros: it's very bright. nice colors. cons: lifx z has a known "network connection drop" problem. (just read the forums/reddit)
customer_reviews.author: gn0st1c

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: We love the LifX lights! We used part of the starter kit to backlight the garland on our mantle (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: Phee

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Support
customer_reviews.text: The lights work as expected but there is a lack of support for the connectors. Specifically the Z strip extensions have been out of stock for over a year now from Lifx or any third party. Contacting Lifx only gets you a canned response of "they'll be available soon". If you only need a direct strip of lights these are great, but if you plan on bridging two strips together go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kbike230

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 LIFX products. This one has great color, but loses its WiFi connection all the time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great lights tho when they
customer_reviews.text: lights disconnect a lot. have to restart them all the time. Great lights tho when they work
customer_reviews.author: nick m.

customer_reviews.title: STUCK ON TEST / DEMO MODE
customer_reviews.text: I got these lights yesterday and was excited to get my computer setup done. I installed everything as instructed and once everything was plugged in the lights just kept flashing RED, GREEN, BLUE and there was no way to stop them or change them in any way. I ended up spending hours trying to troubleshoot the problem tried all the reset methods on the LIFX website and nothing worked. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This lights are actually super awesome. However they have simple flaws that I wish got fixed. 1. Software integration is very clunky and not accurate at all. 2. They will change color and start blinking out of nowhere and then be good for a few days, then start again and so on. Pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these lights are so cool. My son has them in his room and ...
customer_reviews.text: these lights are so cool . My son has them in his room and hooks up to the google and voice command is so convenient. the white light nearly lights up the room well enough for regular use If I put one on the other side of the room it would get rid of all shadows and would work perfectly for substitute main lights we have now.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kosacz

customer_reviews.title: Good under cabinet Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Good light and it does the job well. Had some setup issues so it took a few tries to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: RSMacca58

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not sticky enough
customer_reviews.text: Like all LIFX products, it usually works well with little difficulty. The only real problem is the stickiness. I cleaned the back of the TV with an alcohol swab to make sure it adheres. However, it fell off multiple times. I had to use my own double-sided adherent.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Houck

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The connections were a little flimsy, as I had inadvertently bent one end when trying to insert it into the first length of lights. The adhesive came up from one side after a couple days, but I kind of expected that. Looks amazing around my giant IKEA mirror on my bedroom wall
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best lights ever made. i also have hue lights...just as good. I chose lifx for my cabinets due to the sticky tape...hue is horrible in that department
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Vela

customer_reviews.title: Love lifx lights brightness
customer_reviews.text: Love lifx lights brightness. But this is my third set of these lights. Two strips and one of the power cables are now worthless. The can lights are premium these strips are iffy though
customer_reviews.author: 2 Sik Gaming

customer_reviews.title: Best lights on the market
customer_reviews.text: recently upgraded my lights from philips hur to lifx and I love them. My only complaint is the known issues when setting them up, might require a router reset and tweaks
customer_reviews.author: I AM ODG

customer_reviews.title: One month lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Wifi broke one month after usage. Now it is unusable. It was worth it during the month it functioned like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Tariq

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: The product is great if you don't have to make custom measurements, or jump gaps with small extensions. They work fine out of the box, but what ever you do, DON'T CUT THEM.. Don't even cut them where it says you CAN cut them... They malfunction after that and don't respond to even simple turning on and off... I do not recommend these lights. I will be purchasing a different brand..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too technical , too many apps needed
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get it set up. Need to down load an app then you need to download another app and both apps suck.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Love LIFX
customer_reviews.text: My whole home lighting ecosystem is LIFX and we love it for the vibrant, accurate colors and brightness. I added a strip into the mix and it blends perfectly with the LIFX A19 bulbs we have throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tech_Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to ur smart life
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and easy to use, i just wish it was a lot cheaper, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Lights do not stay connected to network
customer_reviews.text: I have a house full of smart home devices and all of them work mostly seamlessly except LIFX. Bulbs constantly disconnect from the network and have to be reset. When you contact support they will give you a laundry list of chores that almost never works to solve your issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Richards

customer_reviews.title: easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, for some reason easier than the bulbs. LoL. Put them on the back of my X900H and use them when I'm watching movies or playing games. Really happy with them so far and I like the fact I can light up different segments of the strip with different patterns. Wish they were a little brighter and a tad bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, support ignores you.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a base strip and 4 extensions. After just a couple weeks it randomly got stuck in a factory reset loop. I’ve stepped through the help docs multiple times. LIFX just straight up ignores your support requests. I’ve got a ticket open with no response after two weeks now. Waste of $200 and hours of troubleshooting. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and it is pretty easy to configure once you get used to the app.
customer_reviews.author: I luv Amazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the customization and quality!!! Fast to get up and running. I wish you could buy a controller box and power supply since i didn't end up using my extra strip.
customer_reviews.author: Luz M Abril

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a number of smart product and the reviews for LIFX are all on point. From the app to the product, this brand left nothing untouched. Colors are vivid and they never lose connection to my WiFi. My only complaint is you get several wires, but not power supplies. If you’re buying this just to backlight a tv or a smaller piece of furniture, you may end up with an extra light strip and no way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Be patient
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s great!!!! But I have received a few bad models before. However customer service always helps out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope, stopped working after less than a day
customer_reviews.text: Well, this worked for exactly one day until I updated the “firmware” for the first time. Even though it says the update was successfully installed, it’s now stuck on and the app no longer recognizes the device. Can’t add it again either as it refuses to reset. Oh, and the customer support function isn’t working.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and the lights are great. I admit that this really doesn’t stick well at all. I installed this on new cabinets with clean metal surface. Started peeling off within the first day. Had to use small strips of duct tape to hold it down. Not a big deal because it’s hidden but still. Upgrade the stickage.
customer_reviews.author: Jay McLean

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Best around but they don’t stick to anything for very long. I had to tape them down.
customer_reviews.author: James Hart

customer_reviews.title: Hate Lifx
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly difficult setup. Worst support in the world. I am trapped in Lifx hell!
customer_reviews.author: GoodAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesives
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I'm going to start with the bad. I paid $90 for the starter kit... Two days after installing with adhesive it arrived with it's starting to fall down. Not just at the ends but all throughout. Subpar adhesive, which for what I paid is unacceptable. Otherwise i love the colors and ease of use. Just need to figure out how to keep up now, which means more$$$
customer_reviews.author: Sue Larson

product_meta.title: LIFX Z LED Strip Starter Kit
product_meta.description: Style:LIFX Z - Starter Kit (NEW VERSION)The brightest Wi-Fi enabled LED light strip with blended light zones, millions of beautiful colors and whites—no hub required. Apple HomeKit Compatible, Amazon Alexa Compatible and Google Home Compatible. Wi-Fi Router Requirement - 802.11b,g,n standards compliant. Material / Finish - Translucent Plastic.Voltage Range :AC 100-240V 50/60 Hz
feature_bullets: Easy set up. LIFX z strips plug into the wall then use a sticky adhesive to allow you to place them exactly where you want. Simply download the app, connect to Wi-Fi and you're ready to go
Built in Wi-Fi & LIFX cloud. Offers full Lighting control via Wi-Fi and cloud through our LIFX iOS, Android and windows 10 apps and plugs are US-plug A,international-plugs A, C, G and I
Adjustable and dimmable. Connected Lighting for your space, time of day, and mood. Choose from 16 million colors and a full range of warm to cool whites with flexibility to dim the light too
Custom zones. Let your imagination run wild with 8 individually Addressable Color/white zones per meter. Create patterns and custom waveforms to express your creativity
Fit to length. LIFX z can be adjusted to your preferred length to ensure the best fit for your home. Not intended for use in weather-exposed areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars669 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
